name: styled-hooks
description: Style your React components with Hooks

scripts.example:watch: microbundle watch --no-compress --entry example/src/index.tsx --external=@emotion/stylis=Stylis --globals react=React,react-dom=ReactDOM --format umd --jsx React.createElement --output example/dist/bundle.js
scripts.measure: microbundle --entry example/src/measure.ts --external=@emotion/stylis=Stylis --format es --jsx React.createElement --output example/dist/measure.js --sourcemap=false && rimraf example/dist/measure.m.js
scripts.watch: npm run clean && microbundle watch --no-compress --format cjs,es
